Name: Magic defense 2: The Return of the Legend
About the game: The legends are coming back! The main magic tower is in great danger. A horde of stupid magical characters want to destroy the stronghold of good magic and become the only owners of magic! You are the only one who can try to stop them, develop your own tactics to stop the enemy! Can you defeat the enemy and protect the magic? No one knows, but one way or another, the range of available warriors will open up the widest tactical possibilities for you. The game features 20 different levels with cute graphics and excellent special effects. Feel the real excitement of the battles!
